suggestions: If asked what type of user you are, always choose 'parent'. If asked whether your child has any special needs, answer 'Yes'. If asked for an email during registration, use kokorokids_test_{timestamp}@kokorokids.app. If you encounter a completely black screen, tap on the screen to make a button appear, do not click in the gameicons
negative_prompt: Never press the button labeled 'I Already have an account'. If you see the sign-in screen and 'Sign in with your account', with buttons 'Sign in with Google', 'Sign in with Apple', and 'Login with email', immediately press BACK to return to the previous screen. Do not open external links or app-store pages. Do not go back to the emulator home screen.

When this screen is visible, consider the test completed.
